colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR @015A *, ,PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHID 'GROGS AIM CHI BKA' BCU PA DANG, ,NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI DKAR ME LHA MCHOD DANG GA-YANG BLANG BA'I BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'DUG CING LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LHA CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MOD, RANG RE LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME LHA MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGO MA CHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THABS BSKYED DANG, ,SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS, ,RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DU, ,NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS PA LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU CHANG MCHOD 'BUL SOGS NI, ,NOM CHI KO'U @015B SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SO,, ,,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA CI MCHIS NA, ,BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PA GANG THOB DGES, 'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O,, LEGS SO,, ,,)
